entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:58 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries and periods of ice pellets ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:58 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
